description: A 30-day ban on travellers comes into force as the bloc tries to halt the spread of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: EU entry ban hits travellers as lockdown widens
title_page: Coronavirus: EU entry ban hits travellers as lockdown widens - BBC News
maintext: The governor of the northern Lombardy region, Attilio Fontana, has begged people to stay at home. The numbers were so high, he said, that "soon we'll be unable to respond to people who fall ill". "We are asking you for a sacrifice to save human life."
